title: PBE password not updating...
body: I tried changing my password in PBE and I went and opened my client. Then I put in the new password and it didn't work... When I put the last password it logged in. Can I have some help on this? Because I know someone that knows my account's password. And I'd like to change it so he doesn't get to log in my account.

replies.body: Hey, when you go to the password reset page are you sure you're logged into your PBE account?  You could be sending it to your live account.  If that's not the case, hit up our account team through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and we can help you out directly.
Oh sorry it's my live account thank you but I'd like a link please to change my PBE account's password. If you could do that thank you I appreciate it.
Aha!  Sure thing,[ this link ](https://account.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/pbe/en/protect)should take you to the right place.
